name: Kuwagamon
effect: [Start of Your Turn] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] When this Digimon deletes one of your opponent's Digimon in battle and survives, 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon doesn't unsuspend during their next unsuspend phase.
